response.original_title: Where did the days of your life lose their color?
response.overview: The title of this song (Icelandic: "Hvar hafa dagar lífs þíns lit sínum glatað?") is the opening line of the Icelandic poem "Söknuður" by Jóhann Jónsson. The music video follows an artist who has been sleeping through life as he wakes up and confronts loss.
response.title: Where did the days of your life lose their color?
